data.title: YALE FACULTY DROPS MILSTEAD FOR WEDDING; Football Star Broke Academic Rule
data.meta_description: Milstead will be allowed to take final exams
data.text:
YALE FACULTY DROPS MILSTEAD FOR WEDDING; Football Star Broke Academic Rule -- Can Take Final Class Tests.

YALE FACULTY DROPS MILSTEAD FOR WEDDING; Football Star Broke Academic Rule -- Can Take Final Class Tests.

Feb. 15, 1925

See the article in its original context from

February 15, 1925 , Page 6Buy Reprints

TimesMachine is an exclusive benefit for home delivery and digital subscribers.

Full text is unavailable for this digitized archive article. Subscribers may view the full text of this article in its original form through TimesMachine.

NEW HAVEN, Feb. 14. -- Yale has again refused to relax an ironclad rule which prohibits a student of the academic department from marrying. Century Allen Milstead, all-American football star and track and wrestling team member, was tonight notified that he had been dropped from the membership rolls, because he broke the regulation.
